Its capital is Doba. ==Subdivisions== The region of Logone Oriental is divided in six departments: Department Capital Sub-prefectures Nya Bébédjia Bébédjia, Mbikou, Béboni, Miandoum, Komé Nya Pendé Goré Békan, Donia, Goré, Yamodo Pendé Doba Doba, Kara, Madana Kouh-Est Bodo Bodo, Bédjo, Béti Kouh-Ouest Béboto Béboto, Baké, Dobiti Monts de Lam Baïbokoum Baïbokoum, Bessao, Mbaïkoro, Mbitoye, Laramanaye ==References== Category:Regions of Chad
